1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3{-| Changeset. -}
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange
6  ( koshuChangeMain
7    -- * koshu-change.hs
8    -- $main
9  ) where
10
11import System.Console.GetOpt
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.System                  as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Input   as L
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Change  as L
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version as V
18
19
20-- ----------------------  Option
21
22data Option
23    = OptHelp
24    | OptVersion
25    | OptShowEncoding
26    | OptRun
27    | OptLeft
28    | OptRight
29    | OptMinus
30    | OptFrom
31    | OptTo
32    | OptUpdate
33      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord, Enum, Bounded)
34
35koshuOptions :: [OptDescr Option]
36koshuOptions =
37    [ Option "h" ["help"]     (NoArg OptHelp)    "Print help message."
38    , Option "V" ["version"]  (NoArg OptVersion) "Print version number."
39    , Option ""  ["run"]      (NoArg OptRun)     "Run section."
40    , Option ""  ["show-encoding"] (NoArg OptShowEncoding) "Show character encoding."
41    , Option "l" ["left"]     (NoArg OptLeft)    "Standard input for left-hand side."
42    , Option "r" ["right"]    (NoArg OptRight)   "Standard input for right-hand side."
43    , Option "m" ["minus"]    (NoArg OptMinus)   "Output C.k = A.k - B.k"
44    , Option "f" ["from"]     (NoArg OptFrom)    "Output C.k = A.k - B.k"
45    , Option "t" ["to"]       (NoArg OptTo)      "Output C.k = B.k - A.k"
46    , Option "u" ["update"]   (NoArg OptUpdate)  "Apply changeset C.k to B.k"
47    ]
48
49version :: String
50version = "koshu-change-" ++ V.versionString
51
52usage :: String
53usage = usageInfo header koshuOptions
54
55header :: String
56header = unlines
57    [ "DESCRIPTION"
58    , "  Calculate changeset between two dataset."
59    , ""
60    , "USAGE"
61    , "  koshu-change A.k -[mf] B.k"
62    , "  koshu-change B.k -t A.k"
63    , "  koshu-change B.k -u C.k"
64    , ""
65    ] ++ "OPTIONS"
66
67
68-- ----------------------  Main
69
70{-| The main function for @koshu-change@ command. -}
71koshuChangeMain :: IO B.ExitCode
72koshuChangeMain = koshuChangeMain' =<< B.progAndArgs
73
74koshuChangeMain' :: (String, [String]) -> IO B.ExitCode
75koshuChangeMain' (_, argv) =
76    case getOpt Permute koshuOptions argv of
77      (opts, [p1, p2], [])
78          -> run opts (L.File p1) (L.File p2)
79
80      (opts, [p], [])
81          | has OptLeft  -> run opts L.Stdin (L.File p)
82          | has OptRight -> run opts (L.File p) L.Stdin
83          where has = (`elem` opts)
84
85      (opts, _, [])
86          | has OptHelp         -> O.putSuccess usage
87          | has OptVersion      -> O.putSuccessLn version
88          | has OptShowEncoding -> O.putSuccessLn =<< B.currentEncodings
89          where has = (`elem` opts)
90
91      (_, _, errs) -> O.putFailure $ concat errs ++ usage
92
93    where
94      run opts left right
95          | has OptFrom    = left  `L.minusInput`  right
96          | has OptTo      = right `L.minusInput`  left
97          | has OptMinus   = left  `L.minusInput`  right
98          | has OptUpdate  = left  `L.updateInput` right
99          | otherwise      = O.putFailure usage
100          where has = (`elem` opts)
101
102
103-- ----------------------
104-- $main
105--
106-- @koshu-change@ command is implemented using 'koshuChangeMain'.
107--
108-- > import Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange
109-- > 
110-- > main :: IO ()
111-- > main = koshuChangeMain
112
